## Vehicle Driver # Brief Usage: 1. Load your save game and select vehicle 2. Press Enter to take over the vehicle and drive it 3. Use Arrows to drive, H for handbrake 4. Press Enter to release the vehicle never ESC
Known Issues: - Null Reference Exception (NRE) time-bomb crash after releasing accident-involved vehicles that happen too under user control. - ESC key cannot be used to cancel driving; please use ENTER instead, think this causes crash atm. - Driving is currently restricted to a horizontal plane, due to a conflict with the OutOfControlSystem, which handles proper terrain and net collision queries but causes jitter as its fighting mod movement. Simply not finished implementation.
# As designed: - Prevents driving involved in accident vehicle
